body.name: GO Travel Size Mouthwash Packets – Individual Mini Mouthwash for Fresh Breath - TSA Compliant - Smart Packet Design to reduce travel bottle waste - Liquid Mint Flavored Portable Travel Mouthwash Bulk
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 20 mins
features: CONFIDENT, FRESH BREATH: Looking for a quick and easy way to keep your breath fresh and your mouth clean while on the go? Look no further than GO Travel Size Mouthwash! With our convenient mini mouthwash packets, you can say goodbye to bad breath and hello to fresh, clean breath no matter where your adventures take you.

NEVER-ENDING POTENTIAL: Go Travel Mouthwash packets have endless potentials with their various uses, such as providing a refreshing solution during travel, enhancing guests' stays in hotels and Airbnbs, offering a convenient bulk mouthwash option for gyms and medical facilities, and providing a practical solution for maintaining good oral hygiene in food service settings, restrooms, and so many more!

JET-SETTER APPROVED: Travel smart and stress-free with our TSA-approved mini mouthwash packets instead of bottles. Enjoy fresh breath and a clean mouth wherever your travels take you! Perfect portability for trips by plane, hotel stays, camping trips, or business pursuits.

SPILL-PROOF, MOUTHWASH PACKETS: No more worries about stains and spills ruining your clothes! Our travel mouthwash individual packets are formulated with a natural liquid formula that's free from artificial dyes, colors, or harsh ingredients that can cause staining. And that's not all - our travel packets are also gluten-free and have not been tested on animals!

ELEVATE YOUR GUEST EXPERIENCE: Our packets provide a convenient and luxurious solution for guests to freshen their breath and maintain oral hygiene. By providing Go Mouthwash Individual Packets, you can enhance your guests' stay and make them feel appreciated, leaving a lasting impression.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Say goodbye to messy spills and stained clothing with our revolutionary clear mouthwash formula! Our clear, powerful, yet gentle formula is free from harsh ingredients, artificial dyes, and colors that can ruin your clothes. Go Mouthwash travel packets are convenient and 99.9% alcohol-free, gluten-free, and cruelty-free. Get ready for an invigorating and refreshing oral experience with GO Travel Size Mouthwash! This powerful mouthwash goes beyond the surface to deeply cleanse and hydrate your dry mouth. With its potent formula, you can say goodbye to bad breath and hello to a long lasting refreshing mint flavor that will keep your breath fresh for hours. Fresh Breath = Confidence Traveling just got a whole lot easier with our TSA friendly mouthwash packets. No more worrying about bulky bottles taking up precious space in your backpack or luggage. These convenient packets are perfect for all of your adventures, whether you are taking a road trip, jet setting across the world, or simply going to the gym or office. Slip them into your pocket, purse, wallet, or toiletry kit and never be caught without fresh breath again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is it necessary? Maybe
reviews.reviewText: So overall, I would recommend this travel size mouthwash. At first, I was hesitant to buy it because I didn’t know if I really needed it or if this was better than other mouthwash products. Then I purchased it to try for my short conference travel. During the day after meals, I wasn’t able to always brush my teeth but this was a quick alternative/easy way to make sure I didn’t feel stinky. It did definitely make my breath fresh and it was so easy to use carrying in my purse. I saw that some people put these in visitor bathrooms in their house, which is what I’m gonna do now. I don’t know if I will regularly buy this, but I think I will purchase it when I think I need it. The quality of the mouthwash is also very good and it doesn’t have any bitter or weird aftertaste. This is worth it if you are a traveler or have to speak with people a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have!
reviews.reviewText: I keep these in my office to use when I need a mid-day freshen up. I don’t know what I ever did without them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Tastes great and easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Convenient & Medium Mint
reviews.reviewText: Love how portable they are! I purchased the light green, the mint is a medium in my book - stronger than Scope but no where near Listerine. The only negative I have is that they are a bit difficult to open, but then again they don't open up accidentally!Next time I'm going to get the stronger mint flavor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I take these on travel, have a few at work in my desk and even out these in my evening bag when going on dates, to cocktail parties, etc.It’s so easy to slip these into a toiletry bag and when traveling by plane these slide easily into the plastic bag provided by TSA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for office
reviews.reviewText: These are great ideas for my husbands office! He put them in the desk for after lunch to freshen his breath after brushing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh Mouth Fresh Love
reviews.reviewText: I'm seriously in love with this travel packet size mouthwash. It is easy to travel with and doesn't take up any room. The cool fresh mint flavor is great and doesn't burn your mouth. I would even use if I'm not traveling because of the flavor, freshnesses and how you don't have to worry about the typical backwash when you use a bottle of mouthwash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worst taste ever

reviews.reviewText: these are great for emergency kits.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tastes great and great for travel.
reviews.reviewText: Recently brought this with me to Europe. I normally don't feel comfortable with individually packaged items because of the amount of plastic that we know ends up in the landfill but I do make exceptions at times. I travel light and have tried every travel capsule in the market but they all leak, so I decided to try these packets. They taste great and one sachet lasts me 2-3 swigs.
